infobox.Japanese title:: 汽笛の聞こえる古書店3  (Kiteki no Kikoeru Kosho-ten Surī)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Wataru Takagi  Yujiro Tamaki  Ichiro Tamaki  Michiko Yoshikawa

Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Wataru Takagi  Shigeru Ushiyama as Yujiro Tamaki  Takahiro Shimura as Ichiro Tamaki  Miho Miyagawa as Michiko Yoshikawa  Tetsuei Sumiya as Forensics officer  Issei Futamata as Ryoji Nojima  Kyoko Terase as Nagisa Takeuchi  Akira Igarashi as Kosuke Omura

sections.Situation:
Michiko Yoshikawa invites the Detective Boys to Kosuke Omura's writing class, as she wants to learn how to write a novel. The class is held at Ryoji Nojima's house, who sponsored Omura for his books. When Nojima reads how the children write a story, he decides to take them to the basement, where he keeps many valuable books. He asks the group to start reading the book he handled for references.
During lunch break, Michiko reveals that she cut her finger on a book. Ayumi then gives Michiko a band-aid. Moments later, she suddenly collapsed. She is later taken to the hospital.

The police found out that one of the book has a highly-concentrated poison on it. Conan then realizes that the book cover color is Paris Green. It is later being confirmed by Yujiro Tamaki that it is the color that was produced using a powerful poison in the past. Michiko most likely touched the book unconsiously.
However, after Conan found a book with bloodstains and a scratch on the shelf, he knows who is the culprit.

sections.Trivia: - The Whistling Bookstore 4 is the sequel of this episode.
